title: Political Graphic Design
content:
Does anyone know of some good resourses for political design from 1960-1980?  
I am looking for anything from Pins, posters, logos, literature slogans etc you name it.  
Thanks.
author: koop

comments.content: I think it wouldn't be too hard to look at wikipedia for active politicians during that time and then google their names + poster etc. [my fave](http://web.archive.org/web/20130310071953/http:/pics.amres.com/p_thm/w2989.jpg)

Here ( [http://www.abacq.net/imagineria/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20130310071953/http:/www.abacq.net/imagineria/index.htm "http://www.abacq.net/imagineria/index.htm")) you can find posters and murales from the period of Unidad Popular in Chile.
